description.value:
Prerequisite: 11th level, ardent, ardent surge power, Mantle of Elation class feature

Benefit: When you target a bloodied ally with your ardent surge and that ally regains enough hit points to no longer be bloodied, he or she can score critical hits with melee attacks on a roll of 19-20 until the end of your next turn.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 139.
